localString.value: The antique drawer pulls are touched by rust and the drawers themselves fit ill within their sockets. It seems the damp air has not been kind to this piece.

Oh god I have doomed us all I finally have begun to understand what Klactog is he is not an elemental as I first thought but some form of demon. He as locked me in my chambers and has begun to summon elementals on his own. I must find a way to escape and stop him.
A small drawer extends beneath the gleaming tabletop. It probably doubles as a desk when there's the need.

I was right he has a will of his own and a level of intelligence I would never have believed an elemental could posses. It is truly amazing what he is capable of, I have often witnessed him practicing the spells he has seen me cast when he thinks I am gone .
It is a simple chair but the grace of its lines speaks to the quality of its craftmanship.
